thank_you.title: Thank you for using our quote creation tool!
thank_you.thank_you_description: Thank you for using our quote generating tool! Please feel free to contact us at sales@premioinc.com or call us at 1.800.977.3646 to inquiry further about your quote.

thank_you.shipping_address_title: Please enter shipping address in quote to estimate shipping costs

thank_you.login_description: You can find your quote number in the receipt you received via email.
thank_you.login_description_phone: You can find your quote number in the receipt you received via sms.
